name: Laser Racers
overview: Laser Racers is a 1-player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari. After years of torturous labor as a slave in the evil world of Death Complex, finally you have a chance to escape. You steal a Laser Racer and careen through seven deadly rooms of the Complex. The player must navigate seven screens of mazes, but can only move from left to right, with the goal to reach the right hand side of the screen. If the player hits any obstacle, their vehicle is destroyed. Obstacles include moving and flashing walls, and warp pods. The player has 9 lives, and if all are lost, it's game over.
